title: Jr. Softwarer Engineer | Proficient in Javascript & Python | Ready to elevate your brand
about_me: I am a Software Engineer. I love to code and solve problems. I am a quick learner and always try to learn new things. I am a self-taught programmer. I love to work with JavaScript, React, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, etc. I am also familiar with Python, Django, Flask, etc. I am a tech enthusiast and always try to learn new technologies.

professional_journey.description: I am working as a Jr. Software Engineer at Trademajestic Limited. I am responsible for developing and maintaining the company's web applications. I am also responsible for developing new features and fixing bugs. I am also responsible for the deployment of the applications.

I worked as an intern at DevotrixInc. I manage entire projects, focusing on automation development using Python and selenium. I ensure the successful delivery of each project. I also did some FastAPI related tasks here.
